name: Advanced Drainage Systems, Inc.
description: Advanced Drainage Systems, Inc. (ADS) is a leading manufacturer of water management solutions, primarily focused on the stormwater and wastewater management markets. Established in 1966, ADS has evolved into a key player in the plastic pipe industry, providing innovative and sustainable drainage solutions for both residential and commercial applications. The company’s product line includes a variety of advanced drainage systems, such as corrugated polyethylene pipe, chambers, and fittings, which are designed to efficiently manage water flow while minimizing environmental impact. ADS is committed to sustainability and innovation, continuously investing in research and development to enhance its product offerings and improve operational efficiency. Its solutions are utilized in various applications, including agricultural, municipal, and commercial projects, helping to protect water resources and improve infrastructure resilience. With a strong presence in North America and a growing international footprint, ADS aims to lead the industry in providing high-quality, reliable drainage products that ensure effective water management and promote environmental stewardship.
